full_summary:
**Business Consultant**

**Reference:** PW-22-01012510

**Project Number:** W6431-230091B

**Publication Date:** November 4, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 1, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of two (2) Business Consultants, Intermediate Level, to support the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), 1 Canadian Air Division (1 CAD), in the advancement of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) long-term operational and institutional planning, goal analysis, and resource synchronization.

**Estimated Contract Value:**
Two (2) Business Consultants - Intermediate Level, on a time-and-materials basis (147 days, estimated)

**Deadline for Delivery:**
December 1, 2022, to June 30, 2023; with an optional period from July 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024.

**Industry Classification:**
Human Resources Services, Business Consulting/Change Management; Project Management Services

**Commodity/Service Requirements:**
To support the advancement of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) long-term operational and institutional planning, goal analysis, and resource synchronization.

**Security Requirements:**
Secret.

**Trade Agreements:**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA).

**Required Services:**
The services of two (2) Business Consultants, Intermediate Level, to support the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), 1 Canadian Air Division (1 CAD), in the advancement of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) long-term operational and institutional planning, goal analysis, and resource synchronization.

**Eligible Jurisdictions:**
Suppliers are expected to be based and resident in Canada or have a permanent establishment in Canada.

**Submit a Quotation:**
Interest from suppliers is invited to submit a quotation to provide the required services. To be eligible, suppliers must have a qualification on the Task Based
